channel.title: E.T.A. Shipping to Spain, please
channel.description:
Hello!
I hope I am writing in the right section.
I need to buy a couple cores and, since I am traveling within Spain soon, I need to know about estimated time of arrival for them to provide the right address and avoid bouncing parcel.
I don't see this info during the buying process and I cannot find it at Bpost website.
I can see in the site that if I place my order now, it should ship tomorrow (perhaps), that may change tho if I place my order tomorrow, I don't know.
Light, please? Thank you

item.title: E.T.A. Shipping to Spain, please
item.dc:creator: @plagasul Jaume Ferrete V치zquez
item.description:
@plagasul wrote:

Thanks, I got it yesterday. I see how it works now.
Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: E.T.A. Shipping to Spain, please
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

if timing is important, send @johannes a PM, and send him a message via
http://www.axoloti.com/about/johannestaelman/

its only Johannes doing all the building/distribution, so it might be useful if he knows particularly timing is important to you.... he can also supply you the tracking number.
(I cant remember if you get one by default)

Read full topic

item.title: E.T.A. Shipping to Spain, please
item.dc:creator: @plagasul Jaume Ferrete V치zquez
item.description:
@plagasul wrote:

I placed an order past tuesday 11. Received the auto message and that is it. I assume it did not ship the same day, but probably today. Should I expect for a tracking number or any kind of email notice? Is that automated or ... ?

Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: E.T.A. Shipping to Spain, please
item.dc:creator: @killor G. Perez
item.description:
@killor wrote:

It's not that it's a general rule,
but my order of the past 4 / APRIL..I arrived on 6 / APRIL !!
to the capital of GRANADA city . (the truth was super fast)

Now also keep in mind that tomorrow 12 is a holiday in SPAIN and
the shipments will not be delivered until next MONDAY as soon as ..

Read full topic

item.title: E.T.A. Shipping to Spain, please
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

I dont know specifically for axoloti.
But generally in Southern Spain, I allow a week for packages from the UK/EU,
(but that's partly because I'm out in the sticks, so that adds a day or two, probably if your near to a hub its more like 5 days?!)

Read full topic
